intro: Astronidium glabratum, commonly known as the smooth astronidium, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to Brazil and is characterized by its shrub-like growth habit and glossy, dark green leaves. The plant produces small, white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences, often appearing in the axils of the leaves. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and by plant enthusiasts.
